import classes from './CartItem.module.css'; import { Container,Card, Navbar ,Row , Col, Button, Overlay } from "react-bootstrap"; const CartItem = (props) => { const price = `Rs${props.price.toFixed(2)}`; return ( {product.title} -------------------------- {product.price} ------ {product.quantity} ------
) }; export default CartItem;
